ygData.subject: Re: Question /new to the list
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know how to raise it, but I think I know how to lower it -- the Pirates of Guntak in the Ocean of Tears have the faction Fizzlethorpe .  I don t
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Btw, does anyone know how to raise faction with the clerics in
> Rivervale? It's annoying having to use a faction raising
> spell every time I want to recharge the ring. They took out
> the faction gains/losses for recharging/getting the ring when
> they made it no-drop. I suppose I could just destroy them and
> get another from the marshall, but I don't want to lose the
> ring if they ever raise the faction requirement to get it.

I don't know how to raise it, but I think I know how to lower it -- the Pirates
of Guntak in the Ocean of Tears have the faction "Fizzlethorpe". I don't know
for certain if the halfling clerics are this faction, but I know that the only
halfling deity is Fizzlethorpe Bristlebane, and that my halfling cleric is
amiable to kindly to the Pirates. The pirate's natural enemy in the OOT are the
Sisters of Erollisi, but killing them does not raise your Fizzlethorpe faction.

Sorry I can't help more.

Jyzan
